mapper.select: select f.*, u.nick_name as user_nick_name from feed f join feed_like_count flc on f.feed_id = flc.feed_id INNER JOIN user u ON u.user_id = f.user_id where f.is_delete = false and feed_id < #{key} order by flc.like_count desc, f.created_at desc limit #{size}

select f.*, u.nick_name as user_nick_name from feed f join feed_like_count flc on f.feed_id = flc.feed_id INNER JOIN user u ON u.user_id = f.user_id where f.is_delete = false order by flc.like_count desc, f.created_at desc limit #{size}
select f.*, u.nick_name as user_nick_name from feed INNER JOIN user on user.user_id = feed.feed_id INNER JOIN user u ON u.user_id = f.user_id where feed_id = #{feedId} and f.is_delete = false
mapper.insert: insert into feed (user_id,title,species,nickname,temperature, humidity,water_amount,watering_period, content,is_delete,feed_type,created_at,modified_at) values (#{userId}, #{request.title}, #{request.species}, #{request.nickname}, #{request.temperature}, #{request.humidity}, #{request.waterAmount}, #{request.wateringPeriod}, #{request.content}, false, #{request.feedType}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update feed set is_delete = true where feed_id = #{feedId} and user_id = #{userId}
